plot: Charlie's best friend in the whole world is Chaz, a dragon shaped hand puppet. When Charlie meets a girl named Julie, he relishes the chance to make a relationship and can't help but bring Chaz along for the experience.
title: Chaz Monster
plot_es: Charlie's best friend in the whole world is Chaz, a dragon shaped hand puppet. When Charlie meets a girl named Julie, he relishes the chance to make a relationship and can't help but bring Chaz along for the experience.
plot_en: Charlie's best friend in the whole world is Chaz, a dragon shaped hand puppet. When Charlie meets a girl named Julie, he relishes the chance to make a relationship and can't help but bring Chaz along for the experience.
